overview: Only Inhuman is the second studio album by Swedish melodic death metal band Sonic Syndicate.Released May 18, 2007 in Europe and on May 22, 2007, in North America. It's also the first album the band released through their new label, Nuclear Blast, as well as the first to feature vocalist Roland Johansson and drummer John Bengtsson as full-time members.
title: Sonic Syndicate: Only Inhuman
